name: Jade Oakes
text: Great idea for a pizza place. You can build your own pizza and it is very reasonably priced. The staff are nice and the atmosphere is laid back and open.

text: Visited with family today. We all ordered something different. We appreciated that about Blaze. Tasty thin crust. Large enough to be filling.
